entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: We thought the COVID-19 scandal was Trump learning of the virus in January and doing nothing effective or relevant to curtail it until March. Wait until America learns the White House had all the details on the virus in November and failed to prevent the *December* outbreak here.
